content: I have a meeting with my lawyer, Mrs. Smith, soon to discuss my case and go over the questions that the board members might ask me during the hearing. She advised me to be honest and detailed about my experiences, and to provide as much evidence as possible to support my claim. I've been trying to recall every detail of my journey from my home country to Canada, including the dates, times, and routes I took, as well as the people I met along the way.
